<<<<<<< HEAD
Edinburgh, the 13 of December. 1644 Scotland. Parliament. Committee of Estates. Primrose, Archibald, Sir, 1616-1679.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
By Evan Tyler, Printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie, Printed at Edinburgh : 1644.
Caption title. Imprint from colophon. Text begins: The Committee of Estates, taking to their consideration the present condition & estate of this kingdom .... Signed at foot of text: Arch. Primerose. Provides for relief for sufferers from the rebels. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
=======

Caption title. Imprint from colophon. Text begins: The Committee of Estates, taking to their consideration the present condition & estate of this kingdom .... Signed at foot of text: Arch. Primerose. Provides for relief for sufferers from the rebels. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

Evan Tyler
